course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website content overwhelmingly focuses on technical services like website design, web development, front-end development (HTML, CSS, ReactJS, VueJS, AngularJS, JavaScript), mobile development, CMS, e-commerce development (Prestashop, Magento, Opencart), and lists specialized technologies such as Angular, Bootstrap, Jquery, Node, Wordpress, and Zend, indicating a core business deeply rooted in programming and software development.
